title: AI-Integrated English Conversation Competency Enhancement Program Based on Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Business English communication skills development program linked to managerial work environments, structured as a blended learning environment utilizing digital devices (laptops/tablets)

learning_goals: They can understand and summarize meaning-centered inputs of work-related English conversations with over 80% accuracy using AI tools
They can self-correct over 70% of grammatical/vocabulary errors through an AI feedback system
Through project team role-playing, learners can fluently conduct over five minutes of situational workplace conversations
They can implement pronunciation improvements reducing native-language accents by over 40% using an AI pronunciation analysis tool

resources: AI-Powered Pronunciation Assessment Tool (e.g., ELSA Speak)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
